Method Detail

getControlNames

public java.lang.String[] getControlNames()
Description copied from interface: PersistenceControlService
Gets the names of all controls (operating modes). These are controls over persistence as a whole, not media-specific.

Specified by:
getControlNames in interface PersistenceControlService
Returns:
an array of all control names

getControlValues

public OMCRangeList getControlValues(java.lang.String controlName)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceControlService
Gets the (allowed) values of a given control. Values used to set a control must be in the ranges specified by the return.

Specified by:
getControlValues in interface PersistenceControlService
Parameters:
controlName - the name of a persistence-wide control
Returns:
a list of ranges of values that are allowed for the named control.

setControlValue

public void setControlValue(java.lang.String controlName,
                            java.lang.Comparable newValue)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceControlService
Sets the value for the named control. The value must be in the list or ranges returned by PersistenceControlService.getControlValues(java.lang.String).

Specified by:
setControlValue in interface PersistenceControlService
Parameters:
controlName - the name of the control to set.
newValue - the new value for the control. Must be in the allowed ranges.

getMediaControlValues

public OMCRangeList getMediaControlValues(java.lang.String mediaName,
                                          java.lang.String controlName)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceControlService
Gets the allowed values of then named control for the named media plugin. Values used to set a control must be in the ranges specified by the return.

Specified by:
getMediaControlValues in interface PersistenceControlService
Parameters:
mediaName - the name of the media having the control
controlName - the name of a media-specific control
Returns:
a list of ranges of values that are allowed for the named control.

setMediaControlValue

public void setMediaControlValue(java.lang.String mediaName,
                                 java.lang.String controlName,
                                 java.lang.Comparable newValue)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceControlService
Sets the value for the named control for the named media plugin. The value must be in the list or ranges returned by PersistenceControlService.getMediaControlValues(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).

Specified by:
setMediaControlValue in interface PersistenceControlService
Parameters:
mediaName - the name of the media having the control
controlName - the name of the control to set.
newValue - the new value for the control. Must be in the allowed ranges.
